text: Blackmail is a 1929 British thriller movie directed by Alfred Hitchcock in his first sound movie and was based on the 1928 play of the same name by Charles Bennett. It stars Anny Ondra, Sara Allgood, Charles Paton, John Longden, Donald Calthrop, Cyril Ritchard. ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 movies Category:1920s thriller movies Category:British thriller movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Alfred Hitchcock
title: Blackmail (1929 movie)
